AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type yes to active or no to deactive  ; don't write in capital letter)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be download automatically and send to you(type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other user can't use your bot in pm (type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: put A name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many link for your bot menu  ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type true to put your bot on public mode or false to put it on private mod

HEROKU_APY_KEY.description: insert your heroku api-key (this is optionnal)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (this is optionnal)

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID , the code you receive after scanning Qr code

NUMERO_OWNER.desc: Your number , dont put '+' and put you area code(exemple of togo '228')

WARN_COUNT.desc: this is the limit of warn for warning commandes

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want startting-bot-message put false else put true

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: available to indicate that you are online even if you are not. composing to indicate that you are currently typing a message. recording to indicate that you are currently recording an audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: if you want to enable anti delete message put true else put false
